name: RiceBran Technologies
description: RiceBran Technologies is a leading provider of value-added ingredients derived from rice bran, a byproduct of the rice milling process. Founded in 2000, the company focuses on the development of innovative food and nutraceutical products that leverage the nutritional benefits of rice bran. Rice bran is rich in healthy fats, fiber, vitamins, and antioxidants, making it a desirable ingredient for health-conscious consumers. The company's core products include rice bran oil, rice bran protein, and a variety of rice bran powders, which are used in food, dietary supplements, and animal nutrition. RiceBran Technologies operates with a commitment to sustainability, ensuring that its sourcing and production processes minimize environmental impact. The company aims to improve global health through innovative food solutions while maximizing the value of rice, a staple food for billions of people. With a strong focus on research and development, RiceBran Technologies is continually exploring new applications for rice bran and expanding its product portfolio to meet the growing demand for nutritious and functional ingredients. As a pioneer in the rice bran industry, the company is well-positioned to capitalize on trends in clean label products and plant-based nutrition.
